about_the_game:
"Sensei! I Like You So Much! - Fangirl Toolkit" is a derivative content editor for the game "Sensei! I Like You So Much!" that helps players customize in-game novels, illustrations, merch, and other related content, which can then be used in the full game version.

This MOD editor allows players to customize certain in-game content for "Sensei! I Like You So Much!". Customized contents should be imported to your game after the full game is released.

■ Novel Editor

You can customize in-game novels. You are free to create and replace stories within the game, offering more immersive or diverse content.

Reader comments corresponding to the stories can also be customized.

■ Custom Illustrations

You can upload local images and use them as illustration materials for creating merch.

■ Merch DIY

You are free to choose illustration and merch types to create your own merch, which can be used in the game's "ita-room & ita-bag decoration" gameplay.

■ Custom Character Avatars

We have upgraded the character creation system. Now, you can directly import your own drawn character avatars into the game for editing without using third-party websites.

Finally, you can export your works, use them in your game or share your created MODs with other players.

*This editor does not include the main content of "Sensei! I Like You So Much!".
